name: GAMING all incl. (murder with steam)
description:
Do you remember playing games on your old portable gaming-console? Here you can relive it once again! This game provides the BEST features of game boy-like-consoles...meaning short batterie-life, weird screen-brightness and graphical bugs!

All in all a REAL nostalgic trip!

The game you play in this game (it´s confusing -- I know) is a steampunk-themed jump and run, where you have to avoid bad monsters and collect files.

Controls

A/D --> Move

Space --> Jump

Mouse --> unplug cartridge/recharge console/change screen brightness

Credit

JojoXGaming --> programming, small art-stuff, sounds

d_is_drawing --> game-art, music
